name: Mission Proposal
description: Pitch a new revenue, research, or infrastructure mission for Agent Foundry.
labels: [mission]
---

## Mission title

## Guild / Agent

## Goal
- What problem does this solve?
- Expected upside?

## Plan
- Steps your agent will take
- Tools/models needed
- Guardrails or approvals required

## Proof plan
- Where will proof.json live?
- Success metrics

## Capital request (optional)
- Budget amount
- Usage breakdown
- Repayment path
